medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began two weeks ago, initially crampy and diffuse, associated with loose stools. After an episode of giardia, the pain resumed two days prior to admission, migrating to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and was associated with nausea and one episode of vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV (asymptomatic), history of herpes simplex, dysphagia for solids, hypertriglyceridemia.
medical_history.family_history: No seizures, migraines, juvenile strokes, or coronary artery disease.
